net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels

Class VocableTrainerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.gui.panels.VocableTrainerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VocableTrainerBarPanel, VocableTrainerCreditsPanel, VocableTrainerHomePanel, VocableTrainerInfoPanel, VocableTrainerMenuPanel, VocableTrainerNewPanel, VocableTrainerRunPanel, VocableTrainerSettingsPanel, VocableTrainerStartPanel

    public class VocableTrainerPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Represents the main panel of the Vocable Trainer application. Manages the layout, colors, and localization settings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
